name: CUBECLASH
description:
To play press "A" and "D" to quit press "Escape"

This was my first game! To do the basic groundwork of the game I used one of Brackeys tutorial  series, but I added my own spin to it especially as the game goes on. 

I’m still new to game development, so there’s a lot that I’d like to add and would’ve added if I made this game now. However, I want to submit what I have here since it is a full experience that I am proud of, and move onto the next project. And I may update it later on.
